title: duck_house_temperature_humidity_record_round_2
summary: Second temperature and humidity record inside the duck house for the day.
description: This data unit records the second temperature and humidity measurement inside the duck house at MaMeeFarm for the same day. The measurement is captured using a digital thermometer-hygrometer device and is referenced to the first measurement of the day (data unit 00408) to support intra-day environmental tracking.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
